vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Group of kush (כּוּשׁ "Ethiopia" H3568H)
§ Cushi or Ethiopian = see Cushan "their blackness"
This name is used for:
1) one of the descendants of Cush the grandson of Noah through Ham and a member of that nation or people
2) one of Joab's couriers
3) (TWOT) Ethiopian
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Cus; (b)   bisabuelo de Jehudí; (c)   padre de Sofonías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
"古實" 或 "古示" 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他們的黑"
1) 古實的子孫, 古實人
2) 約押的僕從
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
"古实" 或 "古示" 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "他们的黑"
1) 古实的子孙, 古实人
2) 约押的仆从

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Zep.1.1;
son of: Gedaliah (H1436H);
father of: Zephaniah (H6846H)
§ Cushi or Ethiopian = see Cushan "their blackness"
1) one of the descendants of Cush the grandson of Noah through Ham and a member of that nation or people
2) one of Joab's couriers
3) (TWOT) Ethiopian
